config.section.general.name: General
config.bite-faster.name: Bite Faster
config.bite-faster.description: Waiting for fish to bite the bait is no longer necessary.
config.hit-automatically.name: Hit Automatically
config.hit-automatically.description: Clicking the mouse to start the minigame is not required. If "Skip Minigame" is enabled, the fish will be caught automatically.
config.treasure-always-be-found.name: Treasure Always Be Found
config.treasure-always-be-found.descript: Discovering treasure is guaranteed on every attempt, even with "Skip Minigame" enabled.
config.always-caught-double-fish.name: Always Caught Double Fish
config.always-caught-double-fish.descrip: Using Wild Bait always results in catching two fish.
config.caught-double-fish-on-any-bait.na: Caught Double Fish On Any Bait
config.caught-double-fish-on-any-bait.de: The chance to catch two fish is present with any bait used, and can be combined with "Always Caught Double Fish".
config.always-max-cast-power.name: Always Max Cast Power
config.always-max-cast-power.description: Casting power is always at its maximum.
config.section.minigame.name: Minigame
config.skip-minigame.name: Skip Minigame
config.skip-minigame.description: The minigame is skipped, and fish are caught automatically, always achieving a perfect catch.
config.fish-easy-caught.name: Fish Easy Caught
config.fish-easy-caught.description: In the minigame, the fish icon automatically chases the bar.
config.treasure-easy-caught.name: Treasure Easy Caught
config.treasure-easy-caught.description: In the minigame, the treasure icon automatically chases the bar.
config.fish-movement-speed-multiplier.de: This is a multiplier for the fish's movement speed in the minigame.
This modifies how quickly the capture progress bar decreases in the minigame.
This modifies how quickly the capture progress bar increases in the minigame.
config.treasure-catch-speed-multiplier.d: This is a multiplier for the speed at which treasure is caught in the minigame.
